whatIsAnEsimAndHowDoYouUseIt.title: What is an eSIM and how do you use it?
whatIsAnEsimAndHowDoYouUseIt.description: An eSIM is an electronic, or virtual, SIM card. You can use it along with your physical SIM card, if necessary. To start using an eSIM, activate it by scanning a provided QR code (or use manual setup).

howDoIInstallMyEsimFromJetSim.title: How do I install my eSIM from JetSim?
howDoIInstallMyEsimFromJetSim.description1: Once you complete a purchase, you receive a QR code. Then, follow these steps:
howDoIInstallMyEsimFromJetSim.description2: Scan the QR code to activate an eSIM or use an instruction for manual setup.
howDoIInstallMyEsimFromJetSim.description3: Turn on data roaming on your eSIM upon arrival.
howDoIInstallMyEsimFromJetSim.description5: If you can't scan the QR code, try sending it to another device or install it manually (instructions are provided along with the code).

canIUseMyEsimOnAnyDevice.title: Can I use my eSIM on any device?
canIUseMyEsimOnAnyDevice.description1: JetSim eSIM is compatible with the majority of smartphones, smartwatches, and tablets. However, if you have any doubts, please check compatibility before buying an eSIM. You can check it
canIUseMyEsimOnAnyDevice.description2: or contact your cellular provider to learn more.

howIsEsimBetterThanTraditionalSimCards.title: How is eSIM better than traditional SIM cards?
howIsEsimBetterThanTraditionalSimCards.description: With an eSIM, you can start using local mobile networks right upon arrival, even before going through passport control. You can buy and install an eSIM in a few minutes, without standing in long lines at the airport shops to buy a physical SIM card, and it is usually a more pocket-friendly solution. Also, no need to provide your passport for verification.

onceEsimExpiresCanISwitchBackToAPhysical.title: Once eSIM expires, can I switch back to a physical SIM card?
onceEsimExpiresCanISwitchBackToAPhysical.description: Yes, you can switch back to a physical SIM whenever you need it. Don't uninstall an active eSIM if you want to use it later because you can only install it once.

isEsimSecure.title: Is eSIM secure?
isEsimSecure.description: JetSim uses modern encryption technologies to secure the connection between your device and a cellular network.

canIUseBothMySimCardAndAnEsimDuringInter.title: Can I use both my SIM card and an eSIM during international travel?
canIUseBothMySimCardAndAnEsimDuringInter.description: Yes, you can use your physical SIM card and an eSIM simultaneously. Your primary phone number will remain active, and you'll be able to receive calls and SMS. However, note that you'll be charged according to your mobile operator's pricing in this case, which is why eSIM can be a more suitable option.

shouldIInstallMyEsimInAdvanceBeforeTheTr.title: Should I install my eSIM in advance, before the trip?
shouldIInstallMyEsimInAdvanceBeforeTheTr.description1: Note that JetSim's data plan becomes active once you purchase it even if you don't start using it right away, so plan the use accordingly. We recommend purchasing and installing your eSIM once you arrive at your destination.
shouldIInstallMyEsimInAdvanceBeforeTheTr.description2: Note that you need to connect to Wi-Fi or mobile data to install an eSIM. If you believe you may not have access to Wi-Fi when you arrive, it's better to activate your eSIM in advance.

doINeedToProvideMyIdToUseAJetSimEsim.title: Do I need to provide my ID to use a JetSim eSIM?
doINeedToProvideMyIdToUseAJetSimEsim.description: JetSim doesn't request your ID before or after a purchase. You can buy an eSIM and start using it right away.

howManyTimesCanIUseMyEsim.title: How many times can I use my eSIM?
howManyTimesCanIUseMyEsim.description: You can use your QR code to install an eSIM only once and only on any device.

canIReinstallMyEsim.title: Can I reinstall my eSIM?
canIReinstallMyEsim.description: No, you can only scan the QR code once. If you uninstall your eSIM, you have to buy a new plan and install it from scratch.

canICallOrTextWithJetSimEsim.title: Can I call or text with JetSim eSIM?
canICallOrTextWithJetSimEsim.description: JetSim offers only data plans for you to access the internet anywhere. Our eSIMs do not support phone calls or SMS messages.

canIShareInternetAccessWithOtherDevices.title: Can I share internet access with other devices?
canIShareInternetAccessWithOtherDevices.description: Yes, you can use your phone as a personal hotspot. However, you can't install one eSIM on several devices.

whatHappensIfIUseAllMyDataBeforeTheEsimP.title: What happens if I use all my data before the eSIM plan expires?
whatHappensIfIUseAllMyDataBeforeTheEsimP.description1: If you use a standard plan, your eSIM gets deactivated once you use all the data included. If you need more data, you have to buy another plan.
whatHappensIfIUseAllMyDataBeforeTheEsimP.description2: If you purchase an unlimited eSIM, you can use it during the whole plan's duration. You might experience a slightly lower internet speed after a certain threshold, but it may happen only after significant data use.

myQrCodeIsntWorkingWhatShouldIDo.title: My QR code isn't working. What should I do?
myQrCodeIsntWorkingWhatShouldIDo.description1: Here are a few things to check if your QR code isn't working:
myQrCodeIsntWorkingWhatShouldIDo.description2: Check device compatibility with an eSIM. You can do it
myQrCodeIsntWorkingWhatShouldIDo.description3: Check your connection to Wi-Fi or mobile data. You need it to install your eSIM.
myQrCodeIsntWorkingWhatShouldIDo.description4: Try to install your eSIM manually (instructions are provided along with the QR code).
myQrCodeIsntWorkingWhatShouldIDo.description5: If none of the above solutions work, please

SetupJetSim.checkCompatibilityTitle: See if your phone supports eSIM technology
SetupJetSim.checkCompatibilityDescription: Most phones, tablets, and watches support eSIM. However, your device might only support physical SIM cards.

Hero.description: Reliable, affordable worldwide internet with JetSim eSIM

TermsOfService.metadataTitle: Terms of Service | JetSim eSIM Cards
TermsOfService.metadataDescription: Explore JetSim's terms of service governing the use of our eSIM cards for seamless global connectivity. Understand our guidelines and obligations to ensure a secure and enjoyable user experience.
TermsOfService.generalProvisionsContent1: 1.1. These Terms and Conditions constitute a legally binding agreement (“Agreement”) made between you (the “User“) and GIBCO. LTD (hereinafter referred to as 'Jetsim,' 'we,' 'our'), concerning your purchase of an international data plan relating to a prepaid eSIM, for use on your personal device), from Jetsim.
TermsOfService.generalProvisionsContent2: 1.2. Jetsim shall make available Data Plans which relate to specific countries. Jetsim reserves the right to restrict the availability of such Data Plans in some jurisdictions.
TermsOfService.generalProvisionsContent3: 1.3. By availing of the Service, the User acknowledges that they have an unlocked, eSIM-compatible Device, which is required in order to access the eSIM.
TermsOfService.generalProvisionsContent4: 1.4. By registering on the Website or purchasing the Products, the User acknowledges their agreement with the terms outlined in this Agreement.
TermsOfService.generalProvisionsContent5: 1.5. The Website Administration reserves the right to amend this Agreement without prior notification to Users. The updated version of the Agreement comes into effect from the moment it is published on the Website.
TermsOfService.generalProvisionsContent6: 1.6. The User’s access to and use of the Website must comply with Google's Acceptable Use Policy and all applicable local, state, national, and international laws and regulations.
TermsOfService.userRegistrationContent1: 2.1. To purchase Products on the Website, the User must complete the registration process, providing accurate and complete information about themselves.
TermsOfService.userRegistrationContent2: 2.2. The User is responsible for the accuracy of the information provided and must promptly update it in the event of any changes.
TermsOfService.userRegistrationContent3: 2.3. The User agrees not to use false identities or impersonate any other person or entity or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent their affiliation with a person or entity.
TermsOfService.productPurchaseProcedureContent1: 3.1. To place an order, the User selects the desired Product on the Website and completes the order form.
TermsOfService.productPurchaseProcedureContent2: 3.2. Payment for the Products must be made in accordance with the terms stated on the Website.
TermsOfService.rightsAndObligationsHeader: Rights and Obligations of the Parties
TermsOfService.rightsAndObligationsContent1: 4.1. The User has the right to:
TermsOfService.rightsAndObligationsContent2: 4.1.1. Use the Website in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
TermsOfService.rightsAndObligationsContent3: 4.1.2. Purchase the Products presented on the Website.
TermsOfService.rightsAndObligationsContent4: 4.1.3. Contact the Website's customer support service for any questions regarding the use of the Website and the purchase of Products.
TermsOfService.rightsAndObligationsContent6: 4.2.1. Not use the Website for illegal purposes.
TermsOfService.rightsAndObligationsContent7: 4.2.2. Not take any actions aimed at destabilizing the operation of the Website.
TermsOfService.rightsAndObligationsContent8: 4.2.3. Comply with the applicable laws of their jurisdiction when using the Website and purchasing the Products.
TermsOfService.rightsAndObligationsContent9: 4.2.4. Not engage in any activity that could harm the performance or functionality of any service or server, or the networks connected to any service or server.
TermsOfService.rightsAndObligationsContent10: 4.3. The Website Administration has the right to:
TermsOfService.rightsAndObligationsContent11: 4.3.1. Restrict User access to the Website in case of violation of this Agreement.
TermsOfService.rightsAndObligationsContent12: 4.3.2. Modify or remove any information provided by the User if it violates the laws of their jurisdiction or the rights of third parties.
TermsOfService.rightsAndObligationsContent13: 4.3.3. Gather necessary information about the User, in accordance with the Privacy Policy, for the purposes of providing services and for the security of both the User and Website.
TermsOfService.liabilityContent1: 5.1. The Website Administration is not liable for any damage caused to the User as a result of using or being unable to use the Website.
TermsOfService.liabilityContent2: 5.2. The User is responsible for the accuracy of the information provided during registration and order placement.
TermsOfService.liabilityContent3: 5.3. In case of violation of the terms of this Agreement, the Website Administration has the right to take any corresponding measures in accordance with the applicable laws of the User's jurisdiction.
TermsOfService.propertyRightsContent1: 6.1. Except as otherwise indicated, the eSIM is our proprietary property and all source code, databases, functionality, software, website designs, audio, video, text, photographs, and graphics on the Application (collectively, the “Content”) and the trade marks, service marks, and logos contained therein (the “Marks”) are owned or controlled by us or licensed to us, and are protected by copyright and trademark laws and various other intellectual property rights.
TermsOfService.propertyRightsContent2: 6.2. Except as expressly provided in these Terms and Conditions, no part of the eSIM, no Content or Marks may be copied, reproduced, aggregated, republished, uploaded, posted, publicly displayed, encoded, translated, transmitted, distributed, sold, licensed, or otherwise exploited for any commercial purpose whatsoever, without our express prior written permission.
TermsOfService.finalProvisionsContent1: 7.1. This Agreement is governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which the Website operates, unless otherwise stated.
TermsOfService.finalProvisionsContent2: 7.2. The Service are not intended for use by any person or entity in any jurisdiction or country where such use would be contrary to relevant law or regulation. Accordingly, persons who choose to access the Service from locations that prohibit such use do so on their own initiative and are solely responsible for compliance with local laws, if and to the extent local laws are applicable.
TermsOfService.finalProvisionsContent3: 7.3. All disputes and disagreements arising in connection with the execution of this Agreement shall be resolved through negotiations. If the parties fail to reach an agreement, the disputes shall be resolved in accordance with the applicable laws of the jurisdiction in which the Website operates.
TermsOfService.finalProvisionsContent4: 7.4. If any provision of this Agreement is found to be invalid or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect.
TermsOfService.finalProvisionsContent5: 7.5. The User acknowledges and agrees that Google's requirements, including but not limited to those found in their Acceptable Use Policy, must be complied with in all aspects of accessing and using the Website.
TermsOfService.finalProvisionsContent6: 7.6. By using the Website or purchasing Products, the User acknowledges that they have read, understood, and agreed to all terms and conditions stipulated in this Agreement.
